name: Real Champions Football: World League Soccer
name_original: Real Champions Football: World League Soccer
description:
Only the best players are able to take on this challenge! Show off your ball skills and beat each round as though it were a final! Try to survive in the most astonishing soccer matches jumping as high as you can, kicking stronger and sprinting faster than all your rivals.

Be careful not to neglect your goal, because you must to defend it from your opponent shots and attack wisely to defeat them.
